actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Alan Cranston in the case of Rodney F. Stich v. Senator Cranston, et al.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Cranston in the case of Rodney F. Stich v. Senator Alan Cranston, et al. Repeals Senate Resolution 83, 101st Congress, which directed the Senate Legal Counsel to represent several Senators in the case of Rodney F. Stich v. Senator Edward Kennedy, et al.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Alan Cranston in the case of Rodney F. Stich v. Senator Cranston, et al.
